tool_description: Organizes multiple DICOM files into proper series and study hierarchies based on DICOM metadata and relationships.

input_directory.description: Directory containing DICOM files to organize

output_directory.description: Directory where organized DICOM structure will be created

include_subdirectories.description: Recursively search subdirectories for DICOM files

verify_series_integrity.description: Verify completeness and consistency of series

error_messages: Input directory not found: The specified input directory does not exist or is not accessible.
Output directory creation failed: Cannot create output directory structure. Check permissions.
Invalid organization pattern: Use one of [patient_study_series, date_modality, custom].
No DICOM files found: No valid DICOM files detected in the input directory.
Series organization error: Unable to organize files due to missing or inconsistent metadata.
usage: Provide input_directory containing DICOM files and output_directory for organized structure. Configure organization_pattern and other options as needed.

total_files_processed.description: Total number of DICOM files processed

organization_summary.description: Summary of the organization process and structure created

incomplete_series.description: List of series that appear incomplete or have missing files

organization_errors.description: List of files that could not be properly organized
